Rulings.Edison:
●Sending any number of Morphtronic monsters from your hand to the GY is not a cost.
●The ATK increase from Gadget Hauler's effect lasts until it is removed from the field or flipped face-down.
●If Gadget Hauler's effect is activated while Banisher of the Radiance is face-up on the field, the Morphtronic monsters are removed from play instead of being sent to the GY, and “Gadget Hauler’s” ATK does not increase.

Rulings.Base: 1. Sending any number of 'Morphtronic' monsters from your hand to the GY is not a cost.\n2. The ATK increase from the effect of "Gadget Hauler" lasts until it is removed from the field or flipped face-down.\n3. If the effect of "Gadget Hauler" is activated while "Banisher of the Radiance" is face-up on the field, the 'Morphtronic' monsters are removed from play instead of being sent to the GY, and the ATK of "Gadget Hauler" does not increase.
